tool_description: Fast and Reliable API to Get Products and Product Reviews from Capterra in Real-Time (unofficial API).
name: Real-Time Capterra Data
title: Real-Time Capterra Data

api_list.name: Products
api_list.description: Get products by category / search for products on Capterra, with filters, sort option, and pagination support.

required_parameters.name: category_id
required_parameters.description:
Capterra Category ID.

The Capterra Product Category ID can be obtained from a Capterra URL, for example, given the following Capterra URL: *https://www.capterra.com/human-resource-software/* - the Category ID is **human-resource-software**).

optional_parameters.name: pricing_options
optional_parameters.description:
Return products with specific pricing options. Multiple values can be specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `FREE_VERSION, FREE_TRIAL`.

**e.g.** `FREE_VERSION`
**e.g.** `FREE_VERSION,FREE_TRIAL`

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
Return products in a specific sort order.

**Default:** `SPONSORED`

**Allowed values:** `SPONSORED, HIGHEST_RATED, MOST_REVIEWS, ALPHABETICAL`

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
The page to return (each page includes up to 25 results).

**Allowed values:** positive integers.
**Default:** `1`.

api_list.name: Product Reviews
api_list.description: Get product reviews from Capterra, with filters, sort option, and pagination support.

required_parameters.name: product_id
required_parameters.description: Product ID (can be extracted from the company Capterra profile URL - https://www.capterra.com/p/143877/Wattics), in that case *143877*.

optional_parameters.name: time_used
optional_parameters.description:
Return reviews posted by reviewers that used the product for a specific amount of time. Multiple values can be specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `FREE_TRIAL, LESS_THAN_6_MONTHS, LESS_THAN_12_MONTHS, LESS_THAN_2_YEARS, MORE_THAN_2_YEARS`.

**e.g.** `FREE_TRIAL`
**e.g.** `LESS_THAN_12_MONTHS,LESS_THAN_2_YEARS`

optional_parameters.name: frequency_used
optional_parameters.description:
Return reviews posted by reviewers that used the product in a specific frequency. Multiple values can be specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `DAILY, WEEKLY, MONTHLY, OTHER`.

**e.g.** `MONTHLY`
**e.g.** `DAILY,WEEKLY`

optional_parameters.name: reviewers_role
optional_parameters.description:
Return reviews posted by a reviewer with specific role at the company. Multiple values can be specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `USER, ADMINISTRATOR, OTHER`.

**e.g.** `USER,ADMINISTRATOR`
**e.g.** `OTHER`

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
Return reviews in a specific sort order.

**Default:** `MOST_HELPFUL`

**Allowed values:** `MOST_HELPFUL, MOST_RECENT, HIGHEST_RATING, LOWEST_RATING`

optional_parameters.name: company_size
optional_parameters.description:
Return reviews posted by a reviewer with specific company size. Multiple values can be specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `SELF_EMPLOYED, 1_TO_10_EMPLOYEES, 11_TO_50_EMPLOYEES, 51_TO_200_EMPLOYEES, 201_TO_500_EMPLOYEES, 501_TO_1000_EMPLOYEES, 1001_TO_5000_EMPLOYEES, 5001_TO_10000_EMPLOYEES, 10001_OR_MORE_EMPLOYEES`.

**e.g.** `SELF_EMPLOYED`
**e.g.** `5001_TO_10000_EMPLOYEES,10001_OR_MORE_EMPLOYEES`

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description:
Return reviews with specific ratings. Multiple values can be specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `1, 2, 3, 4, 5`.

**e.g.** `5`
**e.g.** `4,5`

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Number of reviews to skip (for pagination).

**Allowed values:** positive integers.
**Default:** `0`.
